DocAttribute.Name: HourOffset
DocAttribute.Documentation: The number of hours by which local time is offset from coordinated universal time.

DocAttribute.Name: MinuteOffset
DocAttribute.Documentation: The number of minutes by which local time is offset from coordinated universal time.

DocAttribute.Name: Sense
DocAttribute.Documentation:
The direction of the offset.
> <font size="-1">Note: The data type of the Sense is an enumeration - AHEAD means positive offset; BEHIND means negative offset.
</font>
